title: Verify Email
description: Verify your email to access all Ace Books features.
warning_message: Your account is not verified. Please verify your email.
error_message: There was an error verifying your email. Try again later.
success_message: Your email has been successfully verified! You can now access all Ace Books features.
toast_error_429: Too many requests. Try again later
toast_error: An error occurred. Try again later
toast_success: Verification email resent. Check your inbox.
